00026 #include "OgreRoot.h"
00027 #include "OgreSDLConfig.h"
00028 #include "OgreSDLError.h"
00029 #include "OgreSDLInput.h"
00030 
00031 namespace Ogre {
00032 
00033     extern "C" void createPlatformConfigDialog(ConfigDialog** ppDlg)
00034     {
00035         *ppDlg = new SDLConfig();
00036     }
00037 
00038     extern "C" void createPlatformErrorDialog(ErrorDialog** ppDlg)
00039     {
00040         *ppDlg = new SDLError();
00041     }
00042 
00043     extern "C" void createPlatformInputReader(InputReader** ppDlg)
00044     {
00045         *ppDlg = new SDLInput();
00046     }
00047 
00048     extern "C" void destroyPlatformConfigDialog(ConfigDialog* dlg)
00049     {
00050         delete dlg;
00051     }
00052 
00053     extern "C" void destroyPlatformErrorDialog(ErrorDialog* dlg)
00054     {
00055         delete dlg;
00056     }
00057 
00058     extern "C" void destroyPlatformRenderWindow(RenderWindow* wnd)
00059     {
00060         delete wnd;
00061     }
00062 
00063     extern "C" void destroyPlatformInputReader(InputReader* reader)
00064     {
00065         delete reader;
00066     }
00067 }
